name: Doom Prophet
description: Fateweavers who manipulate destiny to bring about catastrophe and rule through fear of their terrible predictions, weaving threads of destruction and despair into the tapestry of fate.

resource_systems.name: Mana
resource_systems.description: Mystical energy that powers divination spells and prophecies
resource_systems.regeneration: 3 per 6 seconds, +5 when successfully predicting an event
mechanics: Mana points are spent to cast divination spells and invoke prophecies
Some abilities require maintaining a connection to the future, consuming mana over time
Meditation increases mana regeneration rate by 500% but prevents movement
Can channel mana into destructive prophecies and curses

resource_systems.name: Fate Points
resource_systems.description: Accumulated knowledge of possible futures that can be spent to alter destiny
resource_systems.regeneration: 3 per long rest, additional points gained through significant divinations
mechanics: Fate Points can be spent to reroll dice for self or enemies (forcing worse outcomes)
Can be used to force a critical failure on an enemy's action
Powerful destiny-altering abilities consume multiple Fate Points
Can be invested in long-term prophecies of doom and destruction

resource_systems.name: Destiny Threads
resource_systems.description: Tangible manifestations of fate that can be manipulated to create powerful effects
resource_systems.regeneration: 2 per hour, additional threads gained when significant events align with predictions
mechanics: Threads can be woven into patterns that create various magical effects
Can be attached to individuals to influence their destiny toward negative outcomes
More complex patterns require more threads but produce more powerful effects
Threads can be corrupted to create particularly devastating fate alterations

resource_systems.name: Dread Power
resource_systems.description: Energy harvested from fear and despair caused by your prophecies
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when causing fear or when prophecies of doom come true
mechanics: Increases by 10 when a target is affected by fear from your prophecies
Increases by 25 when a prophesied disaster comes to pass
Decreases by 5 per hour when not actively spreading doom
Can be spent to enhance destructive abilities or create powerful fear effects

class_mechanics.name: Harbinger of Doom
class_mechanics.description: The ability to foresee and bring about the worst possible futures
effects: Can identify the most catastrophic possible future for any situation
Prophecies of doom have a 50% increased chance of coming true
Presence causes unease and dread in all nearby creatures
Can implant visions of doom in the minds of targets, causing fear and despair

class_mechanics.name: Curse Weaving
class_mechanics.description: The ability to bind individuals to terrible fates
effects: Can place powerful curses that alter a target's destiny
Cursed targets suffer increasing misfortune over time
Can create hereditary curses that affect entire bloodlines
Curses are extremely difficult to remove, requiring powerful magic or specific conditions

class_mechanics.name: Catastrophe Manipulation
class_mechanics.description: Direct control over disasters and calamitous events
effects: Can trigger natural disasters in areas of instability
Able to magnify the severity of existing calamities
Can redirect disasters toward specific targets
Presence increases the likelihood of accidents and misfortune

class_mechanics.name: Fear Harvesting
class_mechanics.description: The ability to draw power from the fear and despair of others
effects: Gains strength from the fear of nearby creatures
Can extract and consume the essence of fear directly
Able to sense fear across vast distances
Can implant nightmares that generate fear even in sleeping victims

signature_abilities.name: Apocalyptic Vision
signature_abilities.description: Share a vision of the apocalypse with all creatures in the area, causing terror and despair
mechanics: Affects all creatures within a 100-meter radius
Targets must make a Wisdom save or be paralyzed with fear for 1 minute
Even on successful saves, targets suffer -50% to all actions for 5 minutes
Generates massive amounts of Dread Power based on the number of affected targets
Costs 70 Mana, 4 Fate Points, and 30 Dread Power

signature_abilities.name: Doom Proclamation
signature_abilities.description: Declare an inevitable doom upon a target, binding their fate to a terrible end
mechanics: Target must be within sight and hearing range
Proclamation specifies the nature and timing of the target's doom
Target suffers increasing penalties as the proclaimed time approaches
When the time arrives, target must make a Wisdom save at -10 or suffer the proclaimed fate
Even on a successful save, target takes massive damage and suffers severe debuffs
Costs 80 Mana, 5 Fate Points, and 50 Dread Power

signature_abilities.name: Cataclysm Summoning
signature_abilities.description: Manipulate fate to bring about a massive disaster in the targeted area
mechanics: Target an area within 1 kilometer
Over 1-10 minutes (depending on scale), a natural disaster forms in the area
Can create earthquakes, storms, floods, fires, or other calamities
Disaster causes massive damage and leaves lasting environmental effects
Each victim of the disaster generates Dread Power for you
Costs 100 Mana, 7 Fate Points, and 100 Dread Power

skill_trees.name: Path of the Doomsayer
key_abilities: Inevitable Doom: Prophecy that cannot be averted by any means
Mass Terror: Implant visions of doom in multiple targets simultaneously
End Times Vision: Create an illusion of the apocalypse so convincing it causes physical damage

skill_trees.name: Path of the Curseweaver
skill_trees.focus: Creation and manipulation of powerful curses
key_abilities: Bloodline Curse: Create a curse that affects all members of a family
Fate Binding: Link a target's destiny to a specific doom
Soul Corruption: Permanently alter a target's fate thread, making them prone to misfortune

skill_trees.name: Path of the Catastrophe
key_abilities: Disaster Master: Gain complete control over natural disasters
Plague Weaving: Create and spread magical diseases
World Breaker: Cause permanent damage to the fabric of reality in an area

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Destiny Architect skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Evil alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Successfully bring about a prophesied disaster
Cause a powerful entity to fall through a curse

legendary_items.name: Crown of Inevitable Doom
effects: Wisdom increased by 5
Doom Proclamation cooldown reduced by 12 hours
Prophecies of doom have a 75% increased chance of coming true

legendary_items.name: Robes of the Apocalypse
effects: Dread Power regeneration increased by 100%
Presence causes fear in all creatures within 30 meters
Gain immunity to fear and despair effects

legendary_items.name: Staff of Catastrophe
effects: Cataclysm Summoning cooldown reduced by 3 days
Natural disasters under your control are 50% more powerful
Can store the essence of a disaster to release later

lore: Doom Prophets represent the darkest path a Fateweaver can take, using their mastery over destiny to orchestrate suffering and catastrophe on a massive scale. These sinister oracles have twisted their gift of foresight into a weapon, using their knowledge of possible futures to ensure the worst outcomes come to pass. They rule through fear, making terrible predictions that inevitably come true and offering protection from doom only to those who serve them. Some Doom Prophets seek to bring about the apocalypse itself, believing that the current world must be destroyed to make way for a new reality shaped by their vision. Others simply revel in the power that comes from controlling the fates of others, addicted to the fear they harvest from their victims. Their prophecies are delivered with theatrical flair designed to maximize terror, often accompanied by signs and portents that reinforce their supernatural authority. Kingdoms have fallen at the mere arrival of a Doom Prophet at their gates, as rulers surrender rather than face the meticulously detailed horrors that have been foretold. Those few who dare to defy these dark oracles often find themselves bound to particularly cruel fates, serving as examples of the futility of resistance against one who controls destiny itself.
